channel.title: Awk on Open Monster Vision
channel.description: Recent content in Awk on Open Monster Vision

item.title: How Not to Turn 10000 Json Files Into One Database, The Perils of Freelancing
item.description: The Wrong Way Worse Is Better As a grubby unix hacker, I usually take the easy way on my projects. And as of late, I have been getting fairly simple data conversion jobs from various freelancing sites and customers. So of course, worse is better is my go to philosophy. Well this dug ‘ol @bsdpunk into a little hole. I got a couple of example JSON files, from a guy who said he had a lot of data and wanted to turn them into a single CSV, to load into BigQuery.

item.title: How to Make Money Using Grep Sed and Awk
item.description: The Who I’m your friendly neighborhood unix man. And I have a problem. I love regex. Now I have two problems. The Why Recently I have become destitute so I have taken to using the skills I have to provide for my poor sick family. It’s mostly disabled cats. And when all you have is hammer, everything gets nailed. So I thought, you know what people probably don’t automate enough of…Data Entry.
